scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run tsc
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run test && gulp build --prod && docker build -t psite . && docker tag psite gcr.io/boss00/psite
scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud config set project boss00 && docker push gcr.io/boss00/psite && npm run _prtpm2cmd
scripts.rmcont: docker kill psite0 || true && docker rm psite0 || true
scripts.cont: npm run rmcont && docker run -d --name psite0 psite && docker exec -it psite0 bash || true && npm run rmcont
